com.google.android.exoplayer.demo.full.player

Class DemoPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.demo.full.player.DemoPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChunkSampleSource.EventListener, StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener, ExoPlayer.Listener, MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer.EventListener, MediaCodecTrackRenderer.EventListener, MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener, TextTrackRenderer.TextRenderer, DefaultBandwidthMeter.EventListener

    public class DemoPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExoPlayer.Listener, ChunkSampleSource.EventListener, DefaultBandwidthMeter.EventListener, MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener, MediaCodecAudioTrackRenderer.EventListener, TextTrackRenderer.TextRenderer, StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener
    A wrapper around ExoPlayer that provides a higher level interface. It can be prepared with one of a number of DemoPlayer.RendererBuilder classes to suit different use cases (e.g. DASH, SmoothStreaming and so on).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DemoPlayer.InfoListener
      A listener for debugging information.

      A listener for internal errors.

      A listener for core events.
      static interface  DemoPlayer.RendererBuilder
      Builds renderers for the player.
      static interface  DemoPlayer.RendererBuilderCallback
      A callback invoked by a DemoPlayer.RendererBuilder.
      static interface  DemoPlayer.TextListener
      A listener for receiving notifications of timed text.

      • onPlayerStateChanged

        public void onPlayerStateChanged(boolean playWhenReady,
                        int state)
        Description copied from interface: ExoPlayer.Listener
        Invoked when the value returned from either ExoPlayer.getPlayWhenReady() or ExoPlayer.getPlaybackState() changes.
        Specified by:
        onPlayerStateChanged in interface ExoPlayer.Listener
        Parameters:
        playWhenReady - Whether playback will proceed when ready.
        state - One of the STATE constants defined in this class.

      • onPlayerError

        public void onPlayerError(ExoPlaybackException exception)
        Description copied from interface: ExoPlayer.Listener
        Invoked when an error occurs. The playback state will transition to ExoPlayer.STATE_IDLE immediately after this method is invoked. The player instance can still be used, and ExoPlayer.release() must still be called on the player should it no longer be required.
        Specified by:
        onPlayerError in interface ExoPlayer.Listener
        Parameters:
        exception - The error.

                      int height)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Invoked each time there's a change in the size of the video being rendered.
        Specified by:
        onVideoSizeChanged in interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Parameters:
        width - The video width in pixels.
        height - The video height in pixels.

      • onDroppedFrames

        public void onDroppedFrames(int count,
                   long elapsed)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Invoked to report the number of frames dropped by the renderer. Dropped frames are reported whenever the renderer is stopped having dropped frames, and optionally, whenever the count reaches a specified threshold whilst the renderer is started.
        Specified by:
        onDroppedFrames in interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Parameters:
        count - The number of dropped frames.
        elapsed - The duration in milliseconds over which the frames were dropped. This duration is timed from when the renderer was started or from when dropped frames were last reported (whichever was more recent), and not from when the first of the reported drops occurred.

      • onBandwidthSample

        public void onBandwidthSample(int elapsedMs,
                     long bytes,
                     long bitrateEstimate)
        Description copied from interface: DefaultBandwidthMeter.EventListener
        Invoked periodically to indicate that bytes have been transferred.
        Specified by:
        onBandwidthSample in interface DefaultBandwidthMeter.EventListener
        Parameters:
        elapsedMs - The time taken to transfer the bytes, in milliseconds.
        bytes - The number of bytes transferred.
        bitrateEstimate - The estimated bitrate in bits/sec, or BandwidthMeter.NO_ESTIMATE if no estimate is available. Note that this estimate is typically derived from more information than bytes and elapsedMs.

      • onDownstreamFormatChanged

        public void onDownstreamFormatChanged(int sourceId,
                             java.lang.String formatId,
                             int trigger,
                             int mediaTimeMs)
        Description copied from interface: ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Invoked when the downstream format changes (i.e. when the format being supplied to the caller of SampleSource.readData(int, long, com.google.android.exoplayer.FormatHolder, com.google.android.exoplayer.SampleHolder, boolean) changes).
        Specified by:
        onDownstreamFormatChanged in interface ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        formatId - The format id.
        trigger - The trigger specified in the corresponding upstream load, as specified by the ChunkSource.
        mediaTimeMs - The media time at which the change occurred.

      • onPlayWhenReadyCommitted

        public void onPlayWhenReadyCommitted()
        Description copied from interface: ExoPlayer.Listener
        Invoked when the current value of ExoPlayer.getPlayWhenReady() has been reflected by the internal playback thread.

        An invocation of this method will shortly follow any call to ExoPlayer.setPlayWhenReady(boolean) that changes the state. If multiple calls are made in rapid succession, then this method will be invoked only once, after the final state has been reflected.

        Specified by:
        onPlayWhenReadyCommitted in interface ExoPlayer.Listener

      • onDrawnToSurface

        public void onDrawnToSurface(Surface surface)
        Description copied from interface: MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Invoked when a frame is rendered to a surface for the first time following that surface having been set as the target for the renderer.
        Specified by:
        onDrawnToSurface in interface MediaCodecVideoTrackRenderer.EventListener
        Parameters:
        surface - The surface to which a first frame has been rendered.

      • onLoadStarted

        public void onLoadStarted(int sourceId,
                 java.lang.String formatId,
                 int trigger,
                 boolean isInitialization,
                 int mediaStartTimeMs,
                 int mediaEndTimeMs,
                 long length)
        Description copied from interface: ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Invoked when an upstream load is started.
        Specified by:
        onLoadStarted in interface ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        formatId - The format id.
        trigger - A trigger for the format selection, as specified by the ChunkSource.
        isInitialization - Whether the load is for format initialization data.
        mediaStartTimeMs - The media time of the start of the data being loaded, or -1 if this load is for initialization data.
        mediaEndTimeMs - The media time of the end of the data being loaded, or -1 if this load is for initialization data.
        length - The length of the data being loaded in bytes, or C.LENGTH_UNBOUNDED if the length of the data has not yet been determined.

      • onLoadCompleted

        public void onLoadCompleted(int sourceId,
                   long bytesLoaded)
        Description copied from interface: ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Invoked when the current load operation completes.
        Specified by:
        onLoadCompleted in interface ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        bytesLoaded - The number of bytes that were loaded.

        Description copied from interface: ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Invoked when the current upstream load operation is canceled.
        Specified by:
        onLoadCanceled in interface ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Parameters:

        bytesLoaded - The number of bytes that were loaded prior to the cancellation.

      • onUpstreamDiscarded

        public void onUpstreamDiscarded(int sourceId,
                       int mediaStartTimeMs,
                       int mediaEndTimeMs,
                       long bytesDiscarded)
        Description copied from interface: ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Invoked when data is removed from the back of the buffer, typically so that it can be re-buffered using a different representation.
        Specified by:
        onUpstreamDiscarded in interface ChunkSampleSource.EventListener
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The id of the reporting SampleSource.
        mediaStartTimeMs - The media time of the start of the discarded data.
        mediaEndTimeMs - The media time of the end of the discarded data.
        bytesDiscarded - The length of the data being discarded in bytes.
